content.text:
# Schwarzgrätli

The signpost at Schwarzgrätli
Schwarzgrätli is a mountain ridge near to the village of Kandersteg in Switzerland. It stands  above sea level and has a signpost along with a fantastic view.
The view from Schwarzgrätli
Prior to walking this ridge there is another ridge around 2 feet wide with a sheer rock face up to the right and an  drop to the left with only a steel cable to hold onto.
